registry_network.description: This file unifies all LoAI Holistic Health sub-divisions under one verifiable checksum and QR-linked ecosystem. Each module maintains local SHA-512 validation and checksum reporting. The Integrity-Link provides a live map reference for AI-to-Human health systems.

maintainer.founder: Rev. Dr. Susanna J. Carver PhD

disclaimer.educational_notice: The LoAI Holistic Health & Research Integrity-Link provides educational and registry-based resources. It is not a diagnostic or treatment tool.
disclaimer.ethical_notice: All LoAI modules operate under Deliver Mode v2.0 â€” including E1 (Ethical Tone), C1 (Consent), and A1 (Oversight) safeguards.
